NSInvocation Class Reference

A category on NSInvocation to return a simple invocation without much code. More...

Detailed Description

A category on NSInvocation to return a simple invocation without much code.

If you use NSInvocation just often enough to get yourself in trouble, you might like this. For me, it greatly reduces the time I need to spend refreshing myself with the documentation and troubleshooting crashes.
